Module edu.wgu.qam2schedulingapp
Package edu.wgu.qam2schedulingapp.repository

Class CustomerRepository

java.lang.Object
edu.wgu.qam2schedulingapp.repository.CustomerRepository
public class CustomerRepository extends Object
This is a singleton class that fetches and stores all customers from the database. It also provides methods to add, update, and delete customers, as well as retrieve a customer by ID.

The class utilizes the SqlHelper class to execute SQL queries and the Logs class to log events during its operations.

Fields:

  • allCustomers: An ObservableList that stores all fetched Customer objects.
  • TAG: A string identifier for logging purposes.
  • instance: Static instance of CustomerRepository for singleton pattern.
Author:
Parham Modirniya

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static CustomerRepository getInstance()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of CustomerRepository. If the instance does not exist, it is created.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of CustomerRepository.

    • updateCustomer

      public void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Updates the information of a specific customer in the database using the provided Customer object. If an SQL error occurs during this process, it logs an error.
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object that contains the updated information.

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer(Customer customer)
      Adds a new customer to the database using the provided Customer object. If an error occurs during this process, it logs an error.
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object that contains the information of the new customer.

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer(Customer customer)
      Deletes a specific customer from the database using the provided Customer object. If an SQL error occurs during this process, it logs an error.
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object that contains the information of the customer to be deleted.

    • getCustomerById

      public Customer getCustomerById(int customerId)
      Returns the Customer object with the provided ID from the allCustomers ObservableList. If no Customer with the provided ID is found, it returns null.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The Customer object with the provided ID, or null if no such Customer is found.
